item.description: Hawaiian Dance Partyfor lesbians over 30. Lesbian DJ Kristin Korpos plays great dance music from the 50's to today. Singles mingles 7-8. Dance 8-12pm. Wear a lei,or get one at the dance! To get to Swanton st. enter from Mckay Ave. Free Parking-cash bar-snacks provided-admission is $15.00. For more info.contact Steph V. (781-209-2277) or e-mail Steph-stephievee1@yahoo.com

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Hawaiian Dance Party
